Text.Name: SuperPart_Forg_1
Text.Desc: A secret body naturally possessed by frog Yaoguai. Once achieved, it will excel at suppressing artifacts and rarely miss the target.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance by a huge amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Forg_2
Text.Desc: A secret body naturally possessed by frog Yaoguai. Once achieved, it can use the energy of the whole body to generate sound waves containing special True Qi. Excels at dissipating True Qi inside an artifact in order to suppress it.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Drastically increases the artifact suppression chance.
